Name: DummyEnemy
Description: This enemy does nothing, poor tutorial guy

Name: AttackShieldEnemy
Description: This enemy knows how to shield, it can attack at height 2

Name: AttackHealEnemy
Description: This enemy heals the enemy with least hp ratio

Name: AttackGrowEnemy
Description: This enemy would attack from bottom and then middle and then top. Basically it grow and attack higher and higher, then back to lowest

Name: ShieldHealEnemy
Description: This enemy heals the enemy with least hp ratio and shield!

Name: StealAttackEnemy
Description: This enemy steal certain item from you and attack

Name: AttackStealEnemy
Description: This enemy steal max item you are having and attack

Name: AttackRotateEnemy
Description: This enemy would rotate bag and attack

Name: BossPinata
Description: This boss would flood your bag with useless items

Name: BossExplode
Description: This boss would throw liquid bomb to your bag that explode everything in your bag

Name: EliteCap
Description: This elite enemy would cap each attack to 5 damage

Name: EliteThorn
Description: This elite enemy would return damage to player for each attack he get
